ABOUT-ME.H2: Let’s get know about me closer
ABOUT-ME.TEXT1: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a frontend developer and am currently also training in the backend. My passion for software development was awakened by my intensive work with PC and CAD technologies in dental technology. These experiences sparked my interest in software development, which motivated me to start further training.
ABOUT-ME.TEXT2: In this portfolio I present various projects that I have worked on individually and in groups, demonstrating my skills and knowledge in front-end development. My move into software development was a conscious step driven by strong motivation. After facing work-life balance challenges in dental technology, I have now found a path that meets my professional and personal goals.

SKILLS.TEXT: I have learned various skills in front-end development and gained a lot of experience in different areas of software development that enable me to create great projects.

PROJECTS.H3: This page is a sample of my work - please feel free to try them out.

PROJECT1.DESCRIPTION: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help sharkie to find coins and poison bottles to fight against the killer whale.

PROJECT2.DESCRIPTION: Based on the PokéAPI a simple library that provides and catalogues Pokemon information.

PROJECT3.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.

PROJECT4.DESCRIPTION: Chat-Messenger application in the style of Slack for team communication. You can create channels or chat directly with your co-workers.

CONTACT.PP-TEXT2: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
